comment: Really enjoyed our academic conversations over the years. This goes without saying, but I admire your intellect and hardworking nature. Cheers and all the best for the future!
name: R. Gokul

comment: Btp partner and project group mates. All the best for ur future
name: Rounak Jain

comment: Lots of memories in college just because of you😌
name: Koneti Anuhya

comment: Here's to hoping a strong wind doesn't carry you away! Miss you tons!😂
name: Kothuru Sharvani

comment: We've had a blast making vlogs and reels together! 🫂I think it's time we learn to do our own things😂😂. You're great at keeping me up to date with all the gossip, and I love it!🙌.You're super focused when things get serious, but when it's time to relax, you're the chill champion!😂
name: Rajaputhra Shivani

comment: Na online clg life boring gaa ledu ante adi ne valle bhavana, Neetho ah stickers fight, movie discussions, etc.. etc.. anni memorable a, thanks for being my jerry. online loo eddi pulka aina nuvu clg ki vochaka antha responsible gaa ela tayar ayavo asal ardam kavatley raa babu. Japan loo jagratha ❤️
name: Karthikeya Madishetty

comment:
nuv chala accommodating friend, nee lanti valla valle groups enni years aina survive aitai. lrc lo nee motivation ae friend maku margadarshi.
thank you for everything. 
also japan food aina nek set avvali ani aashistunna.
name: Harshath Gurrala

comment: All the best for the next phase Bhavnakkovv!!!
name: Jaisurya

comment: Bhavanakkka!!! If there is anything good that's happened to me in college, it is you. Ugadi kii nuvvu tiskuna stand and ichina support matram unforgettable. Japan kii poyaka ikada oka thammudu unadu ani matram marchipoku kothi. Alage emaina kotha gossips telisthe ventane chepu.
name: Harshith
